function.name: lightEffect-turnOn
function.description: This function is used to activate a specified light effect on a device for a set duration.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to apply the light effect.

predefinedLightEffect.description: The specific light effect to be applied (e.g., wake-up mode, gradual brightening, sleep mode).

lightEffectTimer.description: The duration for which the light effect should be applied.

groupAction.description: Whether the action applies to a group of devices.
